titleStmt.title: A short catechisme for the instruction of the inhabitants of S.M. For the better preparation of the sacrament of the Lords-Supper. The first part.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.F. for Ralph Smith, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill, near the Royall-Exchange,
